item.description: In confronting the problem of mortality and the falling human population, a radical solution has been floated: Allow women to deliberately become pregnant and give birth.

item.title: Three Ways to Think Less Stupidly About Groups
item.description: On simple ways to think better about groups.

item.title: The Values of Others
item.description: It seems like common-sense to appeal to the values of others, in a Dale Carnegie way. Show people why they should agree with you! People don’t care about your values, they want you to appeal to theirs!
